sentences.sContent: One of the great things about the vampire tradition is that you make it your own.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of the great things about the vampire tradition is that you make it your own.
sentences.sCn: 关于吸血鬼传说最伟大的事情之一就是你可以让它成为你自己的。

phrases.pCn: 吸血蝙蝠；勾引并导致男人毁灭的女人；吮吸膏血者

words.tran: 相信吸血鬼存在的迷信；勒索钱财；勾引

trans.tranOther: in stories, a dead person that sucks people’s blood by biting their necks
